8823.name: Coral Amulet
8823.description: A necklace made with a pretty coral badge and white pebbles.

8824.name: Polished Octarine Necklace
8824.description: A necklace made from pure octarine filled with magic energy.

8825.name: Polished Scarlet Chunk Necklace
8825.description: The scarlet variant of an iron chunk necklace. It raises your defense even more and gives additional benefits.

8826.name: Polished Coral Amulet
8826.description: A necklace made with a pretty coral badge and white pebbles.

8827.name: Conch Shell Necklace
8827.description: A beautiful necklace featuring a small shell. When you hold it up to your ear you can hear distant waves.

8828.name: Oceanheart Necklace
8828.description: A big blue diamond is the centerpiece of this extraordinary treasure. You feel loved when holding it up to your chest.

8829.name: Rusted Necklace
8829.description: This pendant used to look pretty but now it's rusted to the core.

8830.name: Torc Necklace
8830.description: A piece of jewelry for the neck that's merely a hoop with a gap. Worn by many different cultures throughout world history.

8831.name: Ra-Akar's Necklace
8831.description: A necklace of the desert with a strong resemblance of the sand titan. Wearing it grants you additional protection and extra damage.

8832.name: Nomad Necklace
8832.description: Made from ragged cloth and metal badges this witness of the desert gives you a keen advantage on attacks.

8833.name: Bone Necklace
8833.description: A primitive piece of jewelry made from small bones. Early humans have also made these for many different reasons.

8834.name: Black Necklace
8834.description: A necklace made from pitch-black metal that leaves dark smudges on your neck.

8835.name: Flame Necklace
8835.description: A mysterious necklace with a burning pendant. It glows intensively but doesn't scorch the skin.

8836.name: Fusioned Chunk Necklace
8836.description: A misshappen necklace that combines chunks of all kinds of materials.

8837.name: Samhain Offering Necklace
8837.description: A blessed necklace offered as a gift to farewell the warm season. It represents the harvest and the evening sun.

8850.name: Clot Ring
8850.description: A blood-red ring that latches onto your finger.

8851.name: Larva Ring
8851.description: A living ring, not for the squirmish to wear.

8852.name: Wooden Thorn Ring
8852.description: A circular, brambly root with sharp thorns pointing outward.

8853.name: Glow Tulip Ring
8853.description: A luminous ring that holds the essence of glow tulips.

8854.name: Swift Ring
8854.description: Wearing this winged ring creates a slight wind that pushes you forward.

8855.name: Ring of Rock
8855.description: Simple ring found in the deepest of rocks.

8856.name: Ring of Stone
8856.description: Simple ring carved out of stone.

8857.name: Gold Crystal Ring
8857.description: A precious ring featuring ancient gemstones.

8858.name: Melting Crystal Ring
8858.description: A gooey ring dripping slippery slime on the floor.

8859.name: Sky Ring
8859.description: This ring reminds you of the wide open sky.

8860.name: Caveling Mother's Ring
8860.description: An old crystal ring, holding it fills you with a sad feeling you can't describe.

8861.name: Petal Ring
8861.description: A precious ring that has naturally grown in the yellow blossoms of the jungle caves.

8862.name: Mold Ring
8862.description: A soft ring slowly releasing mold spores.

8863.name: Rusted Ring
8863.description: A ring from the depths that someone must have lost long time ago.

8864.name: Sea Foam Ring
8864.description: A translucent ring that looks like a wave frozen in time.

8865.name: Polished Gold Crystal Ring
8865.description: A precious ring featuring an ancient gemstone.

8866.name: Polished Glow Tulip Ring
8866.description: A luminous ring that holds the essence of glow tulips.

8867.name: Polished Swift Ring
8867.description: Wearing this winged ring creates a slight wind that pushes you forward.

8868.name: Ancient Gem Ring
8868.description: This mysterious ring is entirely made out of ancient gemstones, featuring a super rare white one.

8869.name: Ivy's Ring
8869.description: An organic ring grown from slime covered thorns.

8870.name: Skull Ring
8870.description: A grotesque blood-red ring, crested with a tiny caveling skull.

8871.name: Ostara Ring
8871.description: A ring made of leaves and small golden eggs. It is a sign of emerging life and spring.

8872.name: Morpha's Ring
8872.description: A strange, little loop made from blue slime, it almost slides off of your finger.

8873.name: Coral Ring
8873.description: An intricate ring naturally grown from pink, branchy corals.

8874.name: Goldfish Ring
8874.description: A quite lively little ring that tries to swim off of your finger. By the time it realizes it's merely a ring it has already forgot about it again.

8875.name: Lucky Ring
8875.description: A cheaply made ring from a vending machine. If you believe hard enough you may feel more lucky.

8876.name: Ancient Guardian Ring
8876.description: A relic that is made in the same way as the Ancient Guardian Necklace, made for fending off the strongest of foes.

8877.name: Omoroth's Ring
8877.description: A plated looping tentacle that wraps around your finger. Stemming from a titan, it enhances your might in fighting these giant monsters.

8878.name: Octarine Ring
8878.description: A ring made from pure octarine enhanced with magic properties.

8879.name: Magnetic Ring
8879.description: A strange ring that pulls in loot around you in a higher radius. Magnets, how do they work?

8880.name: Golden Spike Ring
8880.description: This golden ring is very uncomfortable to wear but it looks really cool.

8881.name: Polished Octarine Ring
8881.description: A ring made from pure octarine enhanced with magic properties.

8882.name: Polished Magnetic Ring
8882.description: A strange ring that pulls in loot around you in a higher radius. Magnets, how do they work?

8883.name: Polished Golden Spike Ring
8883.description: This golden ring is very uncomfortable to wear but it looks really cool.

8884.name: Spine Ring
8884.description: A ring found at the skeleton of a giant ocean creature. It's made from tiny cervical vertebrae.

8885.name: Wooden Ring
8885.description: A simple wooden ring, nothing more, nothing less.

8886.name: Topaz Ring
8886.description: A precious little ring with a yellow gemstone on top.

8887.name: White Glass Ring
8887.description: This ring is made from a milky, translucent material. The light it reflects makes it harder for enemies to hit you.

8888.name: Septum Ring
8888.description: A golden piece of jewelry that's not put onto the finger but rather on the nose.

8889.name: Ring of Sand
8889.description: A strange ring made from sand that is held together by the currents of time.

8890.name: Bone Ring
8890.description: A prehistoric, crude ring made from bone. Rings like these have been discovered in early human graves.

8891.name: Nomad Ring
8891.description: This small finger band is made from ragged cloth to keep it from heating up in the scorching desert valleys.

8892.name: Black Ring
8892.description: A ring made from pitch-black metal, darkened by the constant presence of immense heat.

8893.name: Flame Ring
8893.description: This strange ring produces a flame that affects anything but its wearer.

8894.name: Bomb Ring
8894.description: A ring crowned with a little bomb idol. Handling explosives while wearing it results in an even stronger blast.

8895.name: Noble Ring
8895.description: An expensive looking ring featuring a ruby. It must have belonged to someone wealthy.

8896.name: Double Ring
8896.description: This ring is made to be put an two fingers at the same time. Revolutionary.

8897.name: Samhain Curse Ring
8897.description: A cursed ring that was used to welcome the cold season into the lands. It represents decay and darkness.

8900.name: Copper Sword
8900.description: A good weapon for slaying foes.

8901.name: Iron Sword
8901.description: A strong weapon for slaying foes.

8902.name: Scarlet Sword
8902.description: A great weapon for slaying foes.

8903.name: Tin Sword
8903.description: A sharp weapon for slaying foes.

8905.name: Slime Sword
8905.description: A strange weapon, good for damaging enemies and slowing them down.

8906.name: Octarine Sword
8906.description: An extraordinary weapon for slaying foes.

8907.name: Slippery Slime Sword
8907.description: A blue variant of the slime sword. It sometimes spreads slime onto your enemies that makes them slide around.

8908.name: Galaxite Sword
8908.description: An otherwordly weapon for slaying foes.

8930.name: Larva Spike Club
8930.description: A bludgeoning weapon that is hard to withstand.

8940.name: Poisonous Sickle
8940.description: Farming tool that turned into a weapon when a great threat had to be slain.

8950.name: Broken Handle
8950.description: A piece of an ancient weapon. Even though it's only the handle it already feels mysteriously balanced in your hand.

8951.name: Rune Song
8951.description: A legendary sword that hums when swung through the air. Its durability is a sign of extraordinary craftsmanship and it has the power to defeat enemies in one strike.

8952.name: Tin Dagger
8952.description: A small blade that allows for quick stabs.

8953.name: Tin Axe
8953.description: A slower but more damaging weapon against multiple enemies.

8954.name: Battle Axe
8954.description: A menacing weapon that swings wide and hits hard.

8955.name: Scarlet Dagger
8955.description: This wavy, crimson dagger pierces through most materials.

8956.name: Ritual Dagger
8956.description: This unusual dagger is made from a big gemstone shard. There are dark red spots on the handle.

8957.name: Octarine Axe
8957.description: This crescent-shaped weapon hits hard and magically arcs towards enemies' weak spots.

8958.name: Anchor Axe
8958.description: This heavy weapon is actually just a ship anchor. Hits very hard and can throw enemies off.

8959.name: Lava Battle Axe
8959.description: A smoldering, heavy weapon that looks like it was just taken out of the forge.

8960.name: Galaxite Dagger
8960.description: A quick-stabbing weapon made for close combat. The blade is so fine that it can cut a hair into two pieces lengthways.

8970.name: Tentacle Whip
8970.description: An elastic tentacle that lashes out at enemies from afar. It's still alive and wiggling in your hand.

8971.name: Hunting Spear
8971.description: A very crude long-reach weapon used by the cavelings dwelling in the Clay Caves. Good to hunt larve and place them over a fire.

8972.name: Prehistoric Crystal Spear
8972.description: One of the first weapons ever made by mankind, but this one has an ancient gemstone in place of a normal spearhead.

9001.name: Bomb
9001.description: A stronger explosive for crowd control and facing giant enemies.

9002.name: Crude Bomb
9002.description: A small explosive to blast walls and enemies.

9003.name: Large Bomb
9003.description: A very strong explosive for massive destruction.

9100.name: Flintlock Musket
9100.description: Can't argue much with a handful of lead coming right at you.

9102.name: Slingshot
9102.description: Simple ranged weapon to fire away at enemies.

9110.name: Grubzooka
9110.description: The heavy shots from the Grubzooka also tear down any dirt, sand and turf walls in its path.

9111.name: Hand Mortar
9111.description: Problems that can't be solved can usually be blasted away.

9112.name: Blowpipe
9112.description: A simple weapon loaded with poisonous darts.

9113.name: Fireball Staff
9113.description: A magical staff that the caveling shamans use in their rituals and against uninvited guests.

9114.name: Octarine Bow
9114.description: A strange bow that enhances the way arrows fly, allowing for quicker shots.

9115.name: Phantom Spark
9115.description: A legendary, masterfully crafted bow that shoots pure energy projectiles. Sometimes those pierce the veil of time and space, calling upon the spirits of the past.

9116.name: Iron Bow
9116.description: A sturdy bow to shoot foes from afar.

9117.name: Wood Bow
9117.description: A crude bow to shoot foes from afar.

9118.name: Scholar's Staff
9118.description: A magical staff wielded by caveling scholars that utilizes an ancient gemstone to produce powerful bolts of energy.

9119.name: Bubble Gun
9119.description: A strange ranged weapon that shoots out hovering bubbles, adding slippery movement on contact.

9120.name: Thowing Daggers
9120.description: A set of curved blades. They're evenly balanced so that throwing them is as easy as pointing a finger.

9121.name: Galaxite Chakram
9121.description: This unique throwing weapon requires finesse and dexterity to be used to its full potential.

9122.name: Burnzooka
9122.description: This fiery weapon was modeled after the grubzooka but enhanced with lava rock shielding to contain its power. Can blast away stone walls and anything weaker.

9123.name: Bomb Scarab Mortar
9123.description: A powerful weapon launching explosive projectiles that resemble the center eye of a bomb scarab.

9400.name: Healing Potion
9400.description: A healthy elixir that heals instantly. Also tastes good.

9401.name: Enrage Potion
9401.description: A strong elixir that buffs your muscles and your temper.

9402.name: Stoneskin Potion
9402.description: A salty elixir that hardens your skin and makes you more resilient.

9403.name: Poison Aid Potion
9403.description: A purple, mucky liquid that tastes horrible but cures any poison.

9404.name: Greater Healing Potion
9404.description: A much healthier elixir that heals instantly. Also tastes great.

9405.name: Keen Potion
9405.description: A cold elixir that focuses your senses and aim.

9406.name: Guardian's Potion
9406.description: A potion that fills you with great courage and the ability to withstand the strongest of foes.

9407.name: Cave Coffee
9407.description: A strong, bottled brew made from unknown ingredients. After ingesting it's hard for you to stand still.

9408.name: Heart Berry Soda
9408.description: This canned sparkly drink is a pure explosion of taste and sweetness in your mouth.

9409.name: Crystal Water
9409.description: Crystal clear water that has been filtered through ancient gemstones.

9600.name: Caveling Bread
9600.description: Dry, hard bread. It feels like chewing chalk but fills the stomach.

9601.name: Jingle Jam Cookie
9601.description: A special gift for participating in the Jingle Jam charity event.

9602.name: Food Ration
9602.description: Canned meal made to last for years. You should look for better food options soon.

9603.name: Cave Crunch
9603.description: A chunky, sweet snack in a wrapper. Must be thousands of years old and probably still edible for a couple more.

9604.name: Glazed Heart Berry
9604.description: A sugar-covered heart berry that's still juicy and fresh underneath. Delicious!

9605.name: Tentacle Jerky
9605.description: A dried piece of tentacle. It's quite tough and keeps your teeth busy.

9606.name: Chewy Cone Candy
9606.description: A super sweet candy that ends up in the gap of your teeth. And it's there to stay.

9607.name: Spooky Pop Candy
9607.description: It looks almost too scary to remove its wrapper. What tasty horrors might await behind?

9608.name: Evil Eye Candy
9608.description: The most wicked creation of all, its taste an insult to the living. Black licorice.

9700.name: Orange Cave Guppy
9700.description: Small, orange fish home to the dirt cave lakes.

9701.name: Blue Cave Guppy
9701.description: Small, blue fish home to the dirt cave lakes.

9702.name: Rock Jaw
9702.description: A small shark that can break almost every material with one bite.

9703.name: Gem Crab
9703.description: This rare crab has ancient gemstones growing all over it.

9704.name: Dagger Fin
9704.description: The scales of this fish are thin like razorblades.

9705.name: Pink Palace Fish
9705.description: A pink, odd-looking fish with weirdly shaped fins.

9706.name: Teal Palace Fish
9706.description: A greenish-blue, odd-looking fish with weirdly shaped fins.

9707.name: Crown Squid
9707.description: All hail the pale king of water!

9708.name: Yellow Blister Head
9708.description: A fish with large yellow bubbles on its head.

9709.name: Green Blister Head
9709.description: A fish with large green bubbles on its head.

9710.name: Devil Worm
9710.description: A hellspawn that dwells in the sea ground. Don't step on it.

9711.name: Vampire Eel
9711.description: A bloodsucking fish latching onto everything that has a pulse.

9712.name: Mold Shark
9712.description: A small predator of the murky mold waters.

9713.name: Rot Fish
9713.description: Half of its body is missing but somehow it's still alive. Creepy.

9714.name: Black Steel Urchin
9714.description: A rare sea critter with spikes as hard as steel.

9715.name: Azure Feather Fish
9715.description: A beautiful blue fish with scales that look like feathers.

9716.name: Emerald Feather Fish
9716.description: A beautiful green fish with scales that look like feathers.

9717.name: Spirit Veil
9717.description: A ghastly fish that floats in the air like it's still underwater.

9718.name: Astral Jelly
9718.description: Extremely rare type of jellyfish. It almost feels like out of this world.

9719.name: Bottom Tracer
9719.description: A bright yellow fish with long barbels that it drags along the sea floor in search for food.

9720.name: Silver Dart
9720.description: This elusive fish appears in swarms as a spectacle of blinking silver to confuse predators.

9721.name: Golden Dart
9721.description: This elusive fish appears in swarms as a spectacle of flickering gold to confuse predators.

9722.name: Pink Coralotl
9722.description: A small pink amphibian with outward-protruding gills that look like corals. It also uses them to draw nutrients out of the waters of the Sunken Sea.

9723.name: White Coralotl
9723.description: A small white amphibian with outward-protruding gills that look like corals. It also uses them to draw nutrients out of the waters of the Sunken Sea.

9724.name: Solid Spikeback
9724.description: A very defensive fish with rock-hard skin and sharp spikes potruding out.

9725.name: Sandy Spikeback
9725.description: A very defensive fish with sandstone skin and jagged spikes potruding out.

9726.name: Grey Dune Tail
9726.description: This grey, agile fish is able to move between water holes in the desert to change feeding grounds.

9727.name: Brown Dune Tail
9727.description: This brown, agile fish is able to move between water holes in the desert to change feeding grounds.

9728.name: Tornis Kingfish
9728.description: An extremely rare enigma of sea life that seems to unify all other fish beneath it.

9729.name: Dark Lava Eater
9729.description: A dark fish with fiery belly that seems to purely feed from liquid stone and the gemstones caught within.

9730.name: Bright Lava Eater
9730.description: A bright fish with fiery belly that seems to purely feed from liquid stone and the gemstones caught within.

9731.name: Verdant Dragonfish
9731.description: This draconic fish has green scales that can withstand remarkably high temperatures.

9732.name: Elder Dragonfish
9732.description: A draconic fish that is several hundred years old. The verdant color of its scales has long faded.

9733.name: Starlight Nautilus
9733.description: A mysterious living fossil that seems to have fused with precious metals and gemstones to ascend to a higher state of being.

9800.name: Blackbug
9800.description: This tiny bug appears in many different places. Right now it's looking for a new home.

9801.name: Larvlet
9801.description: A tiny larva that doesn't harm you but likes to be collected and held in a warm hand.

9802.name: Moon Pincher
9802.description: This blue-purple crustacean always has its claws raised which gives it a seemingly happy expression.

9803.name: Dusk Fairy
9803.description: A tiny butterfly with very delicate wings. Catching it without harming them requires a lot of caution.

9804.name: Dream Messenger
9804.description: Said to be a bringer of good dreams this butterfly is always seen among sleeping creatures.

9805.name: Citrus Pinion
9805.description: An erraticly fluttering butterfly that has bright colors irritating to the naked eye.

9806.name: Ice Wind
9806.description: This blue butterfly flaps its wings so fast that it creates cold air streams.

9807.name: Crimson Wing
9807.description: A small butterfly with deep red wings that seeks the company of other critters.

9808.name: Little Death
9808.description: This small scorpion is harmless to humans but can easily kill smaller creatures if it needs food.

9809.name: Leafhopper
9809.description: A very nervous little fellow. The faintest hint of danger makes it jump away into safety.

9810.name: Earthworm
9810.description: A worm. Nothing special about it.

9811.name: Manyleg
9811.description: This desert critter has an unknown amount of legs. It would simply take too long to count them.

9812.name: Pest Bug
9812.description: A disgusting insect that moves with uncanny speed. It commonly is found in places that have darkness, dirt and food to offer.

9813.name: Sun Pincher
9813.description: This red-yellow crustacean always has its claws raised which gives it a seemingly happy expression.

9900.name: Chipped Blade
9900.description: A piece of an ancient weapon. Its glass-like appearance makes it look fragile but it's harder than any material you've seen.

9901.name: Clear Gemstone
9901.description: A piece of an ancient weapon. Even though it is of the same material as ancient gemstones, this one feels unnaturally clear and infused with a strange energy.

9902.name: Crystal Skull Shard
9902.description: An ancient crystal shard that is only the fraction of something bigger.

9903.name: Shutdown Protocol
9903.description: This blue slate depicts a graph of a sudden spike in energy levels before collapsing.

9904.name: Anomaly Report
9904.description: This blue slate depicts a graph of a disturbance in previous patterns resulting in more advanced processes.

9905.name: Overwrite Transcript
9905.description: This blue slate depicts a graph of an entity redistributing processing power from multiple sources.

9906.name: Channeling Gemstone
9906.description: A specially carved ancient gemstone that focusses energy at it's tip. It seems to be the center piece of an ancient powerful weapon.

9907.name: Fractured Limbs
9907.description: Golden pieces that once seemed to be fused together to endure great pressure. Something inherently powerful must have broken them apart.

9908.name: Energy String
9908.description: A fine filament that has microscopic pieces of ancient gemstones woven into it. Its existence is proof of the absolute mastery over materials by whoever created it.

9909.name: Crystal Meteor Shard
9909.description: This piece is merely a fraction of an enormous ancient gemstone.

10000.name: Brown Easter Egg
10000.description: A dirty collectible egg that can be combined with other types of eggs. Get as many as you can, they might not be around for long.

10001.name: Rose Easter Egg
10001.description: An icky collectible egg that can be combined with other types of eggs. Get as many as you can, they might not be around for long.

10002.name: Gray Easter Egg
10002.description: A rocky collectible egg that can be combined with other types of eggs. Get as many as you can, they might not be around for long.

10003.name: Green Easter Egg
10003.description: A weedy collectible egg that can be combined with other types of eggs. Get as many as you can, they might not be around for long.

10004.name: Large Golden Egg
10004.description: A golden crystalline egg crafted from many smaller ones. It might be used for something more than just decoration...

10100.name: Samhain Goodie Bag
10100.description: A bag full of spooky sweets and secrets. Pop it up to peek inside.
